nodes.text: Sluudrese or Sludese was the native language of the Sludir species from Sluudren. It was mainly formed by grunts, snorts and whinnies, making it harsh-sounding.
There was no written form for that language, and ideas had to be conveyed through intricate images. During the Galactic Empire, written Basic replaced this activity.
Most Sludir were fluent in both Sludese and Basic, although they were only literate in their own language.
